amendment.description: Amendment redirects $1 million in funding within the Operating Grants to the National Railroad Passenger Corporation for the purpose of developing passenger rail service in the Las Vegas area.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to redirect $1 million in funding within the Operating Grants to the National Railroad Passenger Corporation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Titus amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Titus amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A019) offered by Ms. Titus.
